name: Avocado: Design System for Mobile App
description:
Avocado design system of UI components to kickstart your next mobile app project. This file contains:


  • color, typography, buttons, form fields, pull-down menus, nav bars, action sheets, lists etc.
  • auto layout constraints applied for easy scaling
  • variants
